title: 120 Pack Sponge Scourers – Dual-Sided Washing Up Sponges for Kitchen, Dish, Pots & Pans – Multicolour Scouring Pads for Effective Cleaning
features: ✔ Dual-Sided Cleaning Power – Features a soft, absorbent sponge on one side and a tough scouring pad on the other, making it easy to remove grease, grime, and stubborn food residue.
✔ Versatile & Multi-Purpose – Perfect for washing dishes, scrubbing pots and pans, cleaning kitchen countertops, bathroom surfaces, outdoor grills, and more.
✔ Durable & Long-Lasting – Made from high-quality materials, these sponges are designed to withstand repeated use without falling apart, ensuring great value and reliability.
✔ Ergonomic & Comfortable – Each sponge measures 8.5 x 4.5 x 2.5 cm, fitting comfortably in your hand for better grip, control, and effortless scrubbing.
✔ Great Value Pack (120 Sponges) – A bulk pack of 60 provides an ample supply for all your household cleaning needs, whether at home or in a commercial setting.
✔ Bright & Practical Design – Comes in multicolour, allowing you to use different sponges for different tasks, keeping your cleaning routine organized.
description: Product Description Multifunctional Dual-Sided Sponge Scourers for Everyday Cleaning These dual-sided sponges offer an efficient cleaning experience, with a soft, absorbent side for wiping and a textured surface for tackling tougher messes. Designed for daily use, they help maintain cleanliness in the kitchen, bathroom, and other household areas. Their ergonomic size ensures a comfortable grip, making cleaning tasks easier. Durable and long-lasting, they provide excellent value for various cleaning needs. Perfect for keeping surfaces fresh and spotless with minimal effort. Durable & Efficient Dual-Sided Sponge Scourers for Everyday Cleaning A stack of colorful dual-sided sponge scourers, showing the soft yellow side for gentle cleaning and the green textured side for effective scrubbing. Ideal for washing dishes, kitchen surfaces, and household cleaning tasks. Versatile & Long-Lasting Sponges for a Sparkling Clean Home Our dual-sided sponges are designed for maximum versatility and durability, making them a perfect addition to your cleaning supplies. The abrasive side effortlessly tackles tough grime, while the soft, absorbent side is ideal for wiping surfaces without scratching. These sponges are perfect for various tasks, including washing dishes, scrubbing pots and pans, and cleaning kitchen and bathroom surfaces. Each sponge maintains its shape and effectiveness even after repeated use, ensuring long-lasting performance. With a vibrant multicolor design, these sponges not only clean effectively but also brighten up your cleaning routine! Dual-Sided Sponge Scourers for Effective Cleaning Dual-Sided Cleaning: Abrasive side for tough grime, absorbent side for gentle cleaning. Durable: Retains shape and effectiveness after multiple uses. Multi-Purpose: Great for dishes, pots, sinks, and bathroom surfaces. Ergonomic Grip: Comfortable design for better control while cleaning. Bright Colors: Vibrant multicolor pack for an organized cleaning routine. Efficient Cleaning with Dual-Sided Sponge Scourers Experience the power of dual-sided cleaning with our Sponge Scourers, designed to tackle tough grime while gently wiping surfaces. Each sponge features an abrasive side for scrubbing stubborn stains and a soft absorbent side for effortlessly soaking up spills. Made from durable materials, these sponges maintain their shape and effectiveness, ensuring long-lasting performance. Perfect for a variety of tasks, they can be used on dishes, pots, sinks, and bathroom surfaces. Plus, the vibrant multicolor pack keeps your cleaning routine organized and enjoyable.
